description: Dry gas cylinders and mixture for delivery across Canada
full_summary:
### Open Tender for Dry Gas Cylinders and Dry Gas Mixtures
**Tender Reference Number:** PW-23-01024956

**Solicitation Number:** 202301371A

**Tender Title:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites suppliers to submit a tender for a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for the delivery of dry gas cylinders and dry gas mixtures across Canada.

**Tender Description:**
The RCMP requires a total of 1,800 units of dry gas cylinders and dry gas mixtures per year. The estimated delivery time is between March 2023 and April 1, 2024. The delivery period will be for one year with an option to extend it for up to two additional years.

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest priced responsive bid will be used to select the supplier.

**Submission Instructions:** Tenders must be submitted electronically to [michelle.allen@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:michelle.allen@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) by March 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST).

**Important Documents:**
- [202301371 RFSo Final English.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07/26f5c8146f24d39a60659fa36b365fe6/202301371_rfso_final_english.pdf)
- [202301371 Amend 001 FRA.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/28/397c34dcbd45c505b356983e2e0a3ce4/202301371_amend_001_fre.pdf)
- [202301371 RFSo Final French PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07/3c2d437a5640bb4f4e50898d88196fcf/202301371_rfso_final_french.pdf)

**Basis of Selection:** The contract will be awarded to the bidder who submits the lowest priced responsive bid.

**Indigenous Procurement:** The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this tender. Please visit the Government of Canada's Indigenous Business Directory for more information.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA) and the Ta'an Kwach'an Council Final Agreement. Additionally, this tender
